txt_en: I celebrate myself, and sing myself.
txt_cn: 我为自己欢庆，为自己歌唱。
author: Walt Whitman

txt_en: Sometimes you gotta get through your fears to see the beauty on the other side.
txt_cn: 有时候，你要克服内心的恐惧，才能看见彼端的美景。
author: 《恐龙当家》

txt_en: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
txt_cn: 你必须先见到很棒的自己，才能做出很棒的事。
author: 迈克尔·乔丹

txt_en: When all else is lost, the future still remains.
txt_cn: 即使失去一切，未来仍在。
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

txt_en: Wisdom is the power to put our time and our knowledge to the proper use.
txt_cn: 所谓智慧，就是合理利用好我们的时间和知识。
author: Thomas J. Watson

txt_en: When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.
txt_cn: 当我们努力发掘他人的好时，我们往往也会看到自己最好的一面。
author: William Arthur Ward

txt_en: Being brave means knowing that when you fail, you don't fail forever.
txt_cn: 勇敢就是知道即使你失败了，你也不是永远失败。
author: Lana Del Rey

txt_en: We are the hero of our own story.
txt_cn: 我们都是我们自己故事里的英雄。
author: Mary McCarthy

txt_en: Promise yourself to be so strong that nothing can disturb your peace of mind.
txt_cn: 对自己承诺：要强大到任何事情都无法破坏你内心的平和。 ​​​​
author: Christian D. Larson

txt_en: An aim in life is the only fortune worth finding.
txt_cn: 生活的目标，是唯一值得我们去寻找的财富。
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

txt_en: Nobody realizes that some people expend tremendous energy merely to be normal.
txt_cn: 没有人意识到，有些人花了大量的精力就只是为了做个平常人。
author: 阿尔贝·加缪

txt_en: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
txt_cn: 我们的命运是由自己，而不是天上的星星掌握。
author: 威廉·莎士比亚

txt_en: ㅤ
txt_cn: ㅤ
author: ㅤ

txt_en: The wound is the place where the light enters you.
txt_cn: 伤口是光照进你内心的地方。
author: Rumi

txt_en: Nothing you wear is more important than your smile.
txt_cn: 不管如何穿戴，都不比带上你的微笑。
author: Connie Stevens

txt_en: If you focus on what you left behind, you will never see what lies ahead.
txt_cn: 如果你只顾回头看，你就永远无法看到前路有什么。
author: 《美食总动员》

txt_en: I have always regarded myself as the pillar of my life.
txt_cn: 我一直认为，我才是我人生的中流砥柱。
author: 梅丽尔·斯特里普

txt_en: Nothing great in the world has been accomplished without passion.
txt_cn: 世上没有任何伟业的成就能够离得开激情。
author: 黑格尔

txt_en: Instead of wondering when your next vacation is, maybe you should set up a life you don't need to escape from.
txt_cn: 与其期盼下一次假期，不如创造一种不需要逃离的生活。
author: Seth Godin

txt_en: Many individuals have, like uncut diamonds, shining qualities beneath a rough exterior.
txt_cn: 很多人像未经雕琢的钻石，在粗糙的表面下有发光的本质。
author: Juvenal

txt_en: At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets.
txt_cn: 在一天结束的时候，别留下任何借口、解释或悔恨。
author: Steve Maraboli

txt_en: The path to your success is not as fixed and inflexible as you think.
txt_cn: 成功之路并非你想的那么死板和不可改变。
author: Misty Copeland

txt_en: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare; it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.
txt_cn: 并不是因为事情难我们才不敢去做，而是因为我们不敢做事情才难。
author: Seneca

txt_en: There are far, far better things ahead than any we leave behind.
txt_cn: 比起遗落在过去的，未来还有更加美好的在等着我们。
author: C.S. Lewis

txt_en: Without self-discipline, success is impossible, period.
txt_cn: 无自律，不成功，就这样。
author: Lou Holtz

txt_en: I am seeking, I am striving, I am in it with all my heart.
txt_cn: 我在寻找，我在努力，我全身心地投入其中。
author: Vincent van Gogh

txt_en: You are confined only by the walls you build yourself.
txt_cn: 限制你的只有你自己筑起的墙。
author: Andrew Murphy

txt_en: Life's great happiness is to be convinced we are loved.
txt_cn: 人生最大的幸福，就是确信我们是被人爱着的。
author: Victor Hugo

txt_en: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us.
txt_cn: 我们需要决定的是，如何利用好上天赋予我们的时间。
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

txt_en: Some people could look at a mud puddle and see an ocean with ships.
txt_cn: 有些人眼望着泥塘，却能看见千帆竞发的海洋。
author: Zora Neale Hurston
